This week we will take a look at PCA (chapter 10 in "An Introduction to Statistical Learning") and PCA regression (chapter 6.2).

The tidymodels lab sections can be found [here](https://emilhvitfeldt.github.io/ISLR-tidymodels-labs/linear-model-selection-and-regularization.html#principal-components-regression) and [here](https://emilhvitfeldt.github.io/ISLR-tidymodels-labs/unsupervised-learning.html#principal-components-analysis).
